title: The Adventures of David Perry: The Mentor of Might

story.text: David Perry discovers he can manipulate time after a mysterious comet passes overhead, allowing him to add hours to his day. He uses this extra time to offer more in-depth advice and coaching to struggling youths.
David uses his newfound powers to pause time and prevent a local bank robbery, coaching the would-be robbers on better life choices in the process.
He spends the day traveling back several hours repeatedly to manage and perfect a community workshop, effectively mentoring dozens more individuals than physically possible in one day.
David meets with local community leaders, using his ability to accelerate time to demonstrate the long-term benefits of their proposed youth programs.
Caught in a moral dilemma, David debates whether his interference with time is ethical, consulting with his oldest friends and mentees.
David decides to use his powers only for direct, consensual mentorship, helping a young entrepreneur refine her business plan over what seems like weeks, though only a day passes.
Reflecting on his week, David commits to using his powers responsibly, focusing on empowering future generations.

ending: And so, David Perry became a timeless mentor, shaping lives one moment at a time.
moral: Great power truly comes with great responsibility; use it to uplift others.
